verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
verses.transliteration: Ma wad da'aka rabbuka wa ma qalaa

verses.translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
verses.transliteration: Wa la sawfa y'uteeka rabbuka fatarda

verses.translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
verses.transliteration: Alam ya jidka yateeman fa aawaa

verses.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],
verses.transliteration: Wa wa jadaka daal lan fahada

verses.translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
verses.transliteration: Fa am mal yateema fala taqhar

verses.translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
verses.transliteration: Wa am mas saa-ila fala tanhar

verses.translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
verses.transliteration: Wa amma bi ni'mati rabbika fahad dith
